extendedInfo.description: FieldEZ is a cost-effective On-Demand mobile solution that makes managing field sales or service teams very efficient and easy. With features such as service/sales call management & scheduling, calendar, message boards, time & location reporting, FieldEZ provides valuable field insights to management, ensures effective deployment of field personnel and enables them to complete their activities and reporting through their mobiles. FieldEZ provides high ROI in the shortest time with rapid implementation, easy integration and low TCO.FieldEZ caters to the Service and Sales organizations of any size. The organization can gain total control over field personnel deployment and optimize the same, ensure customer confidence through efficient and on time service, ensure field personnel commitment towards company objectives and increase revenues by eliminating missed SLAs/ billing or lapsed AMCs.
